biotools.summary: The Loss-of-Function ToolKit (LoFTK) allows efficient and automated prediction of LoF variants from both genotyped and sequenced genomes, identifying genes that are inactive in one or two copies, and providing summary statistics for downstream analyses.

bioschemas.name: LoFTK
bioschemas.summary: The Loss-of-Function ToolKit (LoFTK) allows efficient and automated prediction of LoF variants from both genotyped and sequenced genomes, identifying genes that are inactive in one or two copies, and providing summary statistics for downstream analyses.
